lexUnit.name: assist.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: help by doing a share of work or by providing money or information.

sentence.text: Dr Alix Thom , of Foster Wheeler Wood Group , is currently assisting the university in the initial planning of the Alumni Association , along with Carol Campbell , who has been appointed alumni officer .
